 CxList methods = Find_Methods();
CxList inputs = Find_Interactive_Inputs();

CxList download = 
	methods.FindByShortName("sendfile");

CxList sanitize = Find_Sanitize();

result = inputs.InfluencingOnAndNotSanitized(download, sanitize);
